title: test: 25 out of 100 finalizer are not called in tinyfin.go
body:
Failed on windows-amd64-gce builder a few times recently: http://build.golang.org/log/1a2e106640beae06227ade2c6cef55bc7d0cf611

```
...
##### ../test
# go run run.go -- tinyfin.go
exit status 1
25 out of 100 finalizer are not called
panic: not all finalizers are called

goroutine 1 [running]:
main.main()
	C:/workdir/go/test/tinyfin.go:59 +0x29f
exit status 2

FAIL	tinyfin.go	1.074s
```

Alex
